title: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has excessive white space
OB: On the Java Source Attachment Preference Page, there is a label positioned in the middle of the page with a large amount of white space. The vertical alignment of this label should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 

1. Load a project from the repository.
2. Select a source folder.
3. Open Properties.
4. Select Java Source Attachment.
5. [Add further details here.]

Expected behavior:

The label should not have excessive white space and its vertical alignment should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.
